lead_paragraph: Sisters Margo (Tichina Arnold) and Karen (Countess Vaughn) and their best friend‘Chelle (Brely Evans) were full figured, bootylicious and proud of it, until Margo returned from Chicago with an impressive new job and a slender new body. Now, no man
